tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: A heartfelt thank you to BabySoon for bringing joy into our lives. Under the guidance of Dr. Jyoti Bali, recognized as Delhi's leading IVF specialist, personalized care and unwavering support were a given. BabySoon Fertility and IVF Centre's state-of-the-art facilities and compassionate team truly make them the best choice in Delhi. Highly recommended for anyone on their fertility journey!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Finally..!!! After almost 2 years of trying naturally we found BabySoon IVF online.. i typed ‚Äúbest IVF centre in Delhi‚Äù and there i found BabySoon IVF and indeed it turned out to be the best for us.
Thank you so much Dr. Jyoti Bali Mam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,

review:
I needed a travellers note and I had called them prior to confirm the procedure and the charges . 
The second i reached they said to do ultrasound which was in another location and then eventually took 500 apart from the consultation and registration fees for just printing out a travellers note. This is something I have seen people do with NRIs even though I had spoken to them before coming but no one will tell you anything till you come and then bill you someway or the other. 

Apparently receptionist doesnt  know all these rules and procedures well then TRAIN them and provide complete information to someone who is coming so they can make the right decision. ********** **** **** * ****** *** **** ***** ** ****** *** ***** *** **** *********** ******* plus wasted my time to go back and forth to do ultrasound and get reports.
Charged higher than mentioned. Doctor didn't give time, not even for two minutes. **** ******** Not recommended

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Wonderful experience!! The staff and Dr. Jyoti Bali were all very friendly and helpful. I especially loved how Dr. Jyoti really took her time to explain our condition as well as the treatment options. We had a great visit and the doctor‚Äôs demeanor has really put us at ease, so I highly recommend BabySoon IVF clinic! üëçüèª

review: Very nice fertility centre, with very cooperative and sincere staff. Doctor Jyoti Bali is very nice and extremely professional, she is always ready to help and respond you at anytime of the day with expert counselling. She is the best doctor and God gifted human being. I highly recommend all the couples with any infertility issue to visit Baby Soon Centre and you would not be disappointed. May God bless Dr Jyoti and Baby Soon.
